text: Fabian Lokaj (born 23 August 1996) is an Albanian professional footballer who plays as a forward for FC Köniz. ==Club career== Ahead of the 2019-20 season, Lokaj returned to FC Köniz.Association fribourgeoise de football - Club - SFV, football.ch, 26 October 2019 ==International career== ===Albania U17=== Lokaj received his first Albania under-17 call-up by manager Džemal Mustedanagić for a friendly tournament developed in August 2012 in Romania. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Albanian footballers Category:Albania youth international footballers Category:FC Thun players Category:FC Köniz players Category:FC Koper players Category:ACS Poli Timișoara players Category:FC Chiasso players Category:CS Gaz Metan Mediaș players Category:BSV Schwarz-Weiß Rehden players Category:VfL Oldenburg players Category:Slovenian PrvaLiga players Category:Liga I players Category:Regionalliga players Category:Albanian expatriate footballers Category:Albanian expatriate sportspeople in Switzerland Category:Albanian expatriate sportspeople in Slovenia Category:Albanian expatriate sportspeople in Romania Category:Albanian expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Expatriate footballers in Switzerland Category:Expatriate footballers in Slovenia Category:Expatriate footballers in Romania Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany
title: Fabian Lokaj
